message: Our hosting provider is experiencing issues with their network infrastructure. As a result, all MRSI Wizard products are currently unavailable. File libraries on this site may also be impacted. We will post any updates here as further informatation becomes available.
title: Network Outage

message: Our hosting provider is conducting planned maintenance Thursday afternoon/evening starting at 15:00 CDT, 15 MAY 25 through 18:00 CDT 10 APR 25. All Wizard applications and Library files will be unavailable during this time.
title: Planned Network Maintenance

message: Planned maintenance is being conducted on March 13 2025, starting at 15:00 CDT through 18:00 CDT. All Wizard applications and Library files will be unavailable during this time.
title: Planned Network Maintenance

message: The MRSI Wizard will be down for planned maintenance on January 17 2025, starting at 1 pm CDT through 3 pm CDT.
title: Server Maintenance

message: The servers for all of the Wizards will be down late this afternoon (Nov 21st) for scheduled maintenance starting at 3pm CST until about 6pm CST. File libraries on this site may also be impacted. We apologize for the inconvenience.
title: Server Maintenance

message: The MRSI Wizard will be down on January 16th from 12 am to 3 am CST while our login provider performs maintenance.
title: Server Maintenance

message: ** UPDATE ** 27 Jun 6:32pm CDT: The server work is completed. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.
title: Power Outage

message: You may experience intermittent interruptions with the Wizard applications due to our network provider experiencing issues affecting connectivity and power due to severe weather. File libraries on this site may also be impacted.
title: Warning status
